definitions.definition: Any substance or means which, applied to animal or other organic tissue, burns, corrodes, or destroys it by chemical action; an escharotic .
The envelope of reflected or refracted rays of light for a given surface or object.
The envelope of reflected or refracted rays for a given curve.
